CN.content:

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 6 The V oc of PQCDTB was greater than the widely known poly(3-hexylthiophene) , P3HT ( V oc = 0.5 - 0.6 V ).

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. V oc: This is the abbreviation for "open-circuit voltage", which is a measure of the voltage that a solar cell can achieve when it is in an open-circuit configuration.
2. PQCDTB: This is the abbreviation for "polymer quantum dot-based donor-acceptor-donor-based thin-film transistor", which is a type of organic solar cell material.
3. P3HT: This is the abbreviation for "poly(3-hexylthiophene)", which is another type of organic solar cell material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the relevant entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties:

1. V oc: This is the abbreviation for "open-circuit voltage", which is a measure of the voltage that a solar cell can achieve when it is in an open-circuit configuration.
2. PQCDTB: This is the abbreviation for "polymer quantum dot-based donor-acceptor-donor-based thin-film transistor", which is a type of organic solar cell material.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
